{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Corega |model=CG-WLAP11 |revision= (APL-11) |ean=4519157000147 |asin= |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf=BroMax |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=in Japan, in Europe |type=access point |est_release_date=04/2002 |fcc_date= |fcc_id= |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Ubicom |cpu1_model=IP2022 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=SST |fla1_model= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=BroMax WM253-IJ |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) (non-standard connector) |wi1_chip1_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip1_model= |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model=ISL3685 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=10M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=corega |default_ssid_regex=^corega$ |default_ip=192.168.1.230 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Corega Wireless LAN APL-11}} :[http://corega.jp/product/list/wireless/wlapl11.htm Product page (JP)]{{â€¢}}[http://corega.jp/support/manual/pdf/wlapl11_a.pdf Manual]
{{WiFiCert|W000568|09/04/2002}}
*[http://www.geocities.co.jp/SiliconValley-Bay/4096/tmp245.html Internal images are available on this '''GeoCities''' page] of a JP user :that modified their unit (and '''I-O DATA''' NP-BBRP router) to support PoE. :"3752-03100010" is silkscreened on the main board. A date code of '''0217''' (April 2002) is etched onto the bottom of the board. :There is a '''SST''' Flash on-board "WM253-IJ", "SN", "REV"<...>, and a date code of '''0213''' (April 2002) :is silkscreened on the PRISM 2.5 wireless module.
This device does not appear to have a HTTP configuration interface.
Default settings (including the SSID) are per '''corega''''s manual. :There is no default password. Additional specifications, per the manual and product page, follow... *Antenna: dipole, single *Range **Maximum: 50 meters (indoors), 150 meters (outdoors) **@11Mbps: 1Mbps: 30 meters (indoors), 60 meters (outdoors) *Dimensions (H x D x W): [[Dimensions::110 mm x 73 mm x 22 mm]] *Weight (unit itself, no AC adapter): [[Weight::156 g]] *Power supply: external (coaxial connector), 5VDC 1.5A input *Power consumption: 1.9 W (maximium) *Current consumption: 350 mA (average), 370 mA (maximum)
